title: Higher order approximation of option prices in Barndorff-Nielsen and Shephard models. (arXiv:2401.14390v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: We present an approximation method based on the mixing formula (Hull & White 1987, Romano & Touzi 1997) for pricing European options in Barndorff-Nielsen and Shephard models. This approximation is based on a Taylor expansion of the option price. It is implemented using a recursive algorithm that allows us to obtain closed form approximations of the option price of any order (subject to technical conditions on the background driving L\'evy process). This method can be used for any type of Barndorff-Nielsen and Shephard stochastic volatility model. Explicit results are presented in the case where the stationary distribution of the background driving L\'evy process is inverse Gaussian or gamma. In both of these cases, the approximation compares favorably to option prices produced by the characteristic function. translated_title: Barndorff-Nielsen和Shephard模型中期权定价的高阶逼近方法
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种基于混合公式（Hull＆White 1987，Romano＆Touzi 1997）的逼近方法，用于在Barndorff-Nielsen和Shephard模型中定价欧式期权。该逼近方法基于期权价格的泰勒展开。它使用递归算法实现，可以得到任意阶数的期权价格的闭式逼近（在背景驱动的L\'evy过程满足技术条件的情况下）。该方法适用于任何类型的Barndorff-Nielsen和Shephard随机波动率模型。在背景驱动的L\'evy过程的稳态分布为倒数高斯分布或伽马分布的情况下，我们给出了明确的结果。在这两种情况下，该逼近方法与特征函数产生的期权价格相比具有良好的比较效果。特别地，我们还对该逼近方法进行了误差分析，部分基于Das＆Langren\'e（2022）的结果。我们得到了误差的渐近结果。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种基于混合公式的逼近方法，用于在Barndorff-Nielsen和Shephard模型中定价欧式期权。该方法基于期权价格的泰勒展开，通过递归算法获取任意阶数的期权价格的闭式逼近。结果显示，在背景驱动的L\'evy过程满足特定条件的情况下，该逼近方法在倒数高斯分布或伽马分布的稳态分布情况下表现优秀，并对该逼近方法进行了误差分析，得到了误差的渐近结果。
